name: Inner Reflection (vocare4)
description:
Hello, this is the fourthGame Jam that I've participated in! I will admit the game is not finished so please be gentle. Also, that it's not as completed because I finally figured out a bug I have been fighting since Friday!

Description: You are reflecting on your inner self. What does one do when they're reflecting on their inner selves you might ask? Well they figure out their problems or topics that have been bothering them! This is what you need to do! Look through the windows into your inner self for reflection!

For the first level: Something is clogging your life from "flowing".

Again apologies for not having this more completed, its just that bug I ran into was really putting me under. 

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move around while your mouse used to look around and mouse button to click!
